thread.title: France confirms Q2 stagnation
thread.title_full: France confirms Q2 stagnation | Business Spectator

author: Dow Jones newswires
title: France confirms Q2 stagnation
text:
French statistics agency Insee confirmed on Wednesday that the country's economy failed to grow in the second quarter as consumer spending and investment slowed sharply.
The eurozone's second-largest economy recorded zero quarter-on-quarter growth in the second quarter after a bumper 0.7 per cent in the first quarter of the year. Insee reported the same numbers in its initial reading of gross domestic product in August.
Consumer spending stagnated in the second quarter and the combined investment of households, companies and the state dropped 0.2 per cent.
Insee also said consumer spending power fell 0.1 per cent in the second quarter as salary growth slowed, taxes rose and consumer prices strengthened after a decline in the first quarter.
The statistics agency said the margins of non-financial companies were down 0.1 percentage points to 31.1 per cent after a 1.4 percentage point jump in the first quarter.
